description: Email marketing platform for list management, campaign sending, tagging & unsubscribes. Automate contact management and campaign engagement tracking.

actions.name: add_or_update_contact
actions.description: Adds a new contact to a list or updates an existing contact if one exists.

actions.name: add_tag_to_contact
actions.description: Add one or more tags to a contact in a specified list.

actions.name: find_contact
actions.description: Finds a contact by email address within a given list.

actions.name: remove_tag_from_contact
actions.description: Remove one or more tags from a contact in a specified list.

actions.name: update_contact_email
actions.description: Change the email address of a contact in a list.

triggers.name: contactUnsubscribes
triggers.description: Triggers when a contact unsubscribes from a list.

triggers.name: emailClicked
triggers.description: Triggers when a link inside a specific campaign email is clicked.

triggers.name: email_bounced
triggers.description: Triggers when an email to a recipient bounces from a specific campaign.

triggers.name: email_opened
triggers.description: Triggers when a recipient opens an email from a specified campaign.

triggers.name: newContact
triggers.description: Triggers when a new contact is added to a particular list.
